heading: HR00939
0:
RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS AND COMMITTEE
ON MUSLIM AFFAIRS, TO CONDUCT A JOINT INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF
LEGISLATION, ON THE MAY 24 EID’L FITR BOMBING HITTING CIVILIAN
HOMES, KILLING 2 CHILDREN AND INJURING 12 OTHERS IN BARANGAY
KITANGO, DATU SAUDI AMPATUAN, MAGUINDANAO
principal-authors: CULLAMAT, EUFEMIA "KA FEMIA" C.; ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; GAITE, FERDINAND R.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2020-06-03
